recap in English ç®—å•¦ï¼

It is often suggested that we shall have a English channel on Lihkg,
which is not quite a cautious suggestion.

It is because, anyway, the discussion in its original way is the most authentic.
Once there is a English channel, the participant is not the population of the original. In this way,
it may lose its original representiveness.

Let's just recap our words in English, as far as possible.
